description: Discover the best hotels in Te Awanga, New Zealand. Find exclusive deals and luxury accommodations.

hotels.title: Luxury Hawke's Bay Countryside Retreat with World-Class Golf Course, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Dinner
hotels.description: Escape to the serene landscapes of Hawke's Bay with a stay at this five-star retreat, set on 6,000 acres of rolling pastures and dramatic cliffs overlooking the Pacific Ocean. This luxury lodge offers an authentic New Zealand experience, with opportunities to explore the property's working sheep and cattle farm, or tee off with a round on the world-class 71-par championship golf course. Indulge in farm-to-table cuisine at The Dining Room, where the menu is inspired by the rich bounty of the surrounding land and sea. Venture out to explore the region's acclaimed wineries, or take a scenic walk through the ancient Maori sites scattered across the property.

seo.title: Hotels in Te Awanga - New Zealand Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Find the best hotels in Te Awanga, New Zealand with exclusive deals. Book your perfect getaway with up to 60% off.
